Description: Papyrus written with black ink with demotic legal text on recto (7 ll. and vestiges of 2 more) and verso (4 ll. with names of witnesses). Thompson's MS Catalogue: "Receipt of purchase money of land sold by Sentotoes daughter of Sebek-hotep to her brother Harsiese(?) [...] Date and origin. lost."
Curator's comments: Cf. entry in www.trismegisots.org - DAHT. Edited in S.E. Thomas Cambridge PhD diss. Text 32 in Shore's Manuscript Catalogue of Demotic Gebelein Papyri in the British Museum. Publication in progress (S.E. Thomas).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (334) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/334)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: insect attack, loss, bloom Black ink (abraded) Tabbed: silk Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: paper (damaged) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair - lacunae
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alan Henderson Gardiner
